mapper.sql: f_id, f_folder_id, f_name, f_size, f_path, f_use_count, f_is_delete, f_createtime, f_creator_id, f_updatetime, f_updater_id
mapper.insert: insert into t_file (f_id, f_folder_id, f_name, f_size, f_path, f_use_count, f_is_delete, f_createtime, f_creator_id, f_updatetime, f_updater_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{folderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_file
f_id,
f_folder_id,
f_name,
f_size,
f_path,
f_use_count,
f_is_delete,
f_createtime,
f_creator_id,
f_updatetime,
f_updater_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{folderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_file
f_folder_id = #{folderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_use_count = #{useCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
f_createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_file set f_folder_id = #{folderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_use_count = #{useCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, f_createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select fi.f_id, fi.f_folder_id, fi.f_name, fi.f_size, fi.f_path, fi.f_use_count, fi.f_is_delete, fi.f_createtime, fi.f_creator_id, fo.f_name as folderName,te.f_name as teacherName from t_file fi left join t_folder fo on fi.f_folder_id = fo.f_id left join t_teacher te on fi.f_creator_id = te.f_id where fi.f_is_delete = false and fi.f_folder_id = #{folderId}
select count(*) from t_file where f_is_delete = 0 and f_folder_id = #{folderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select b.f_name from t_work_project_file a left join t_file b on a.f_file_id = b.f_id where a.f_work_project_id = #{workProjectListId} and a.f_is_delete = 0 and b.f_is_delete = 0;

select b.f_id, b.f_folder_id, b.f_name, b.f_path, a.f_file_type from t_work_project_file a left join t_file b on a.f_file_id = b.f_id where a.f_work_project_id = #{workProjectListId} and a.f_is_delete = 0 and b.f_is_delete = 0;

select b.f_id, b.f_folder_id, b.f_name, b.f_path, a.f_file_type from t_work_project_file a left join t_file b on a.f_file_id = b.f_id where a.f_work_project_id = #{workProjectListId} and a.f_file_type = #{type} and a.f_is_delete = 0 and b.f_is_delete = 0;
